product_description: Cheesy puffs are made of a mixture of cheese powder and cornmeal, giving them a crunchy texture and cheesy flavor.
Chocolate-covered marshmallows are made from fluffy marshmallows coated in rich chocolate.
Rainbow gummy bears are chewy candies in various fruit flavors and vibrant colors.
Caramel popcorn is made by coating popped corn kernels with a sweet caramel glaze.
Sour candy strips are tangy candies in various fruit flavors, perfect for a sour-sweet treat.
